original:
You guys can't win against us,
don't you get that already?
So just hurry up and leave here.
Tell your boss this:
If you do anything to these Digimon,
we won't show mercy next time!
translation:
You guys can't win against us,
don't you get that already?
So just hurry up and leave here.
Tell your boss this:
If you do anything to these Digimon,
we won't show mercy next time!

original:
If you continue like this, you'll be 
the ones who end up being erased.
translation:
If you continue like this, you'll be 
the ones who end up being erased.

original:
P-Rank potential is 58%.
Report to the Selectors.
P-Rank potential is 58%.
Report to the Selectors.
translation:
P-Rank potential is 58%.
Report to the Selectors.
P-Rank potential is 58%.
Report to the Selectors.

original:
Erasers, retreat.
Erasers, retreat.
translation:
Erasers, retreat.
Erasers, retreat.

original:
Looks like... they hadn't really
accepted their defeat, had they?
translation:
Looks like... they hadn't really
accepted their defeat, had they?

original:
They're probably going to return
at some point...
translation:
They're probably going to return
at some point...

original:
We'll worry about that when we 
need to, let's hurry inside!
translation:
We'll worry about that when we 
need to, let's hurry inside!

original:
T-t-this is terrible!

How could something like this
happen?!
translation:
T-t-this is terrible!

How could something like this
happen?!

original:
Ahh... The DigiPlates have all
disappeared...
translation:
Ahh... The DigiPlates have all
disappeared...

original:
On top of that, the Evolution Tree
has completely stopped working!
translation:
On top of that, the Evolution Tree
has completely stopped working!

original:
Even if I try to activate it through
the console, nothing happens!
I'll have to try and repair it 
through the DigiLab!
translation:
Even if I try to activate it through
the console, nothing happens!
I'll have to try and repair it 
through the DigiLab!

original:
Calm down, Calumon! There's no
point in getting so worked up!
Now let's take a breath, and check
the Evolution Tree again...
translation:
Calm down, Calumon! There's no
point in getting so worked up!
Now let's take a breath, and check
the Evolution Tree again...

original:
If I don't hurry, it'll...
it'll be too late, won't it?!
translation:
If I don't hurry, it'll...
it'll be too late, won't it?!

original: Hey, Terriermon, wake up already!
translation: Hey, Terriermon, wake up already!

original:
This isn't the time to be lazing
around!
translation:
This isn't the time to be lazing
around!

original: Terriermon! Wake up! Come on!
translation: Terriermon! Wake up! Come on!

original: Snap out of it, Terriermon!
translation: Snap out of it, Terriermon!

original:
O-Oh! Are you guys alright?!
Those guys from earlier...
translation:
O-Oh! Are you guys alright?!
Those guys from earlier...

original:
They're called Erasers. They're
soldiers of the Selectors.
It appears they've managed to
destroy the Evolution System.
translation:
They're called Erasers. They're
soldiers of the Selectors.
It appears they've managed to
destroy the Evolution System.

original:
But it's strange... 

It looks like they only destroyed the
Evolution System and nothing else.
translation:
But it's strange... 

It looks like they only destroyed the
Evolution System and nothing else.

original:
You say that like it's not a huge
deal,
but doesn't that mean we're no 
longer able to Digivolve?!
translation:
You say that like it's not a huge
deal,
but doesn't that mean we're no 
longer able to Digivolve?!

original:
^P, what do we do now?!
You'll fix it for us, won't you?!
translation:
^P, what do we do now?!
You'll fix it for us, won't you?!

original:
Is everyone ok?! They didn't hurt 
you or anything?
translation:
Is everyone ok?! They didn't hurt 
you or anything?

original:
We're fine, they just stunned us
temporarily.
translation:
We're fine, they just stunned us
temporarily.

original:
Didn't those Eraser guys say 
some weird stuff?
Something about not having
permission to erase us...
translation:
Didn't those Eraser guys say 
some weird stuff?
Something about not having
permission to erase us...

original:
Regardless, we're glad 
everyone's alright.
Machines and buildings can be
easily rebuilt.
translation:
Regardless, we're glad 
everyone's alright.
Machines and buildings can be
easily rebuilt.

original:
But can you really fix it? Calumon
was making a pretty big fuss.
He was saying that the Evolution 
System's busted beyond repair 
or something...
translation:
But can you really fix it? Calumon
was making a pretty big fuss.
He was saying that the Evolution 
System's busted beyond repair 
or something...

original:
That does seem to be the case...

Even though we were so close to
fully repairing the Evolution Tree...
But if all the DigiPlates are 
brought back and connected...
Then all Digimon will regain the
ability to Digivolve.
translation:
That does seem to be the case...

Even though we were so close to
fully repairing the Evolution Tree...
But if all the DigiPlates are 
brought back and connected...
Then all Digimon will regain the
ability to Digivolve.

original:
Calm down, Terriermon.
Everything will be alright.
If we do our best, I'm sure we'll 
be able to fix it.
translation:
Calm down, Terriermon.
Everything will be alright.
If we do our best, I'm sure we'll 
be able to fix it.

original:
No matter how difficult, no matter
how much time it takes...
We must dedicate ourselves to
fixing it, no matter what.
translation:
No matter how difficult, no matter
how much time it takes...
We must dedicate ourselves to
fixing it, no matter what.

original:
That's right! Cheer up, Terriermon!

We'll lend you guys a hand, too!
translation:
That's right! Cheer up, Terriermon!

We'll lend you guys a hand, too!

original: Right, ^P?
translation: Right, ^P?

original:
Will you help repair 
the Evolution system?
translation:
Will you help repair 
the Evolution system?

original: Of course I'll help!
translation: Of course I'll help!

original: Let me think about it...
translation: Let me think about it...

original:
^P?!

What's with that reply? Everyone
is counting on you, you know!
translation:
^P?!

What's with that reply? Everyone
is counting on you, you know!

original:
As expected of you, ^P!

You're more reliable than someone
I know♪
translation:
As expected of you, ^P!

You're more reliable than someone
I know♪

original:
Yup, yup, as expected of one
of my best friends.
You're as reliable as I am♪
translation:
Yup, yup, as expected of one
of my best friends.
You're as reliable as I am♪

original: Thank you, everyone!
translation: Thank you, everyone!

original:
Alright, everyone. Let's split up 
and check the damage to the Base.
translation:
Alright, everyone. Let's split up 
and check the damage to the Base.

original:
Hmm... Asuka, can you join me in
checking the DigiFarm?
^P, can you go with 
Terriermon and check the DigiLab?
And... Gatomon, can you and 
Hiroyuki do a System Check?
translation:
Hmm... Asuka, can you join me in
checking the DigiFarm?
^P, can you go with 
Terriermon and check the DigiLab?
And... Gatomon, can you and 
Hiroyuki do a System Check?

original:
Don't let Hiroyuki near 
any switches Gatomon!
He'll end up pressing them left 
and right!
translation:
Don't let Hiroyuki near 
any switches Gatomon!
He'll end up pressing them left 
and right!

original:
You're so mean, Asuka!

You make it sound like I'm stupid!
translation:
You're so mean, Asuka!

You make it sound like I'm stupid!

original:
Sound like...?

More like you're 100% pure stupid.
translation:
Sound like...?

More like you're 100% pure stupid.

original:
Hmm... About half of the Evolution
Tree has been messed up...
The Evolution Program itself has 
also been modified...
At this rate, Digimon won't
be able to Digivolve or Degenerate.
translation:
Hmm... About half of the Evolution
Tree has been messed up...
The Evolution Program itself has 
also been modified...
At this rate, Digimon won't
be able to Digivolve or Degenerate.

original:
Hey, it'll be okay! We've only just 
started working on it. 
There's bound to be plenty of 
surprises, but for now,
all we can do is our best, right, 
Terriermon?
translation:
Hey, it'll be okay! We've only just 
started working on it. 
There's bound to be plenty of 
surprises, but for now,
all we can do is our best, right, 
Terriermon?

original:
Good morning, ^P. 
Did you sleep well?
translation:
Good morning, ^P. 
Did you sleep well?

original:
Asuka and Hiroyuki have already
gotten up.
They're waiting at the entrance. 
You should go talk to them.
translation:
Asuka and Hiroyuki have already
gotten up.
They're waiting at the entrance. 
You should go talk to them.

original:
...Hey, Bug Plates are just dirty 
and broken DigiPlates, right...?
I understand that much, but what
exactly are DigiPlates themselves?
translation:
...Hey, Bug Plates are just dirty 
and broken DigiPlates, right...?
I understand that much, but what
exactly are DigiPlates themselves?

original:
DigiPlates are just clusters of data
of various Digimon.
A Digimon's Digivolution is 
controlled by the Evolution Tree.
Originally the Tree contained
DigiPlates for every Digimon.
However, now, about half of those
plates are broken or missing...
That's why, right now, many 
Digimon are unable to Digivolve.
Until the Tree is fixed, Digimon will
be stuck as they are.
translation:
DigiPlates are just clusters of data
of various Digimon.
A Digimon's Digivolution is 
controlled by the Evolution Tree.
Originally the Tree contained
DigiPlates for every Digimon.
However, now, about half of those
plates are broken or missing...
That's why, right now, many 
Digimon are unable to Digivolve.
Until the Tree is fixed, Digimon will
be stuck as they are.

original:
While I don't quite understand it
fully...
That's not good news, is it?
translation:
While I don't quite understand it
fully...
That's not good news, is it?

original:
For Digimon, Digivolution is vital to 
their existence and survival.
translation:
For Digimon, Digivolution is vital to 
their existence and survival.

original:
Y...you'll be able to fix it, right?

If we all do our best, it'll work out,
right?
translation:
Y...you'll be able to fix it, right?

If we all do our best, it'll work out,
right?

original:
...Yeah, it will. You're right.

We just need to gather the Bug
Plates and repair them.
Returning fixed Plates will help the
Evolution Tree return to normal.
translation:
...Yeah, it will. You're right.

We just need to gather the Bug
Plates and repair them.
Returning fixed Plates will help the
Evolution Tree return to normal.

original:
Sometimes you'll get a
Bug Plate from fighting Digimon.
Not necessarily that particular 
Digimon's plate,
But it could be one of their 
Digivolutions or Degenerations.
Any one of them has a chance of 
being dropped after a battle.
translation:
Sometimes you'll get a
Bug Plate from fighting Digimon.
Not necessarily that particular 
Digimon's plate,
But it could be one of their 
Digivolutions or Degenerations.
Any one of them has a chance of 
being dropped after a battle.

original:
In other words, in order to
repair the Evolution Tree...
We need to go out and fight a 
range of different Digimon, right?
translation:
In other words, in order to
repair the Evolution Tree...
We need to go out and fight a 
range of different Digimon, right?

original:
Then we need to hurry and 
become Tamers, too!
That way we can defeat lots of 
different Digimon and collect Plates!
translation:
Then we need to hurry and 
become Tamers, too!
That way we can defeat lots of 
different Digimon and collect Plates!

original:
You just watch, ^P!

I'll surpass you and become a
Super Tamer!
translation:
You just watch, ^P!

I'll surpass you and become a
Super Tamer!

original:
Don't go saying stuff like that
so casually.
Besides, don't you need to be 
acknowledged by a Digimon as its 
Tamer to receive a Digivice?
translation:
Don't go saying stuff like that
so casually.
Besides, don't you need to be 
acknowledged by a Digimon as its 
Tamer to receive a Digivice?

original:
Huh? Is that right?

Then I'll work my absolute hardest
to be recognized!
translation:
Huh? Is that right?

Then I'll work my absolute hardest
to be recognized!

original:
Don't you dare!

You working hard will just mean 
you'll make a mess of things!
Just be quiet, stay in the DigiBase,
and mop the floors!
translation:
Don't you dare!

You working hard will just mean 
you'll make a mess of things!
Just be quiet, stay in the DigiBase,
and mop the floors!

original:
Thank you, everyone.

With all your support, I believe
everything will work out okay!
translation:
Thank you, everyone.

With all your support, I believe
everything will work out okay!

original:
Yeah... To be honest, I felt 
concerned with just us Digimon.
But with a Tamer on our side,
I feel much more relieved.
translation:
Yeah... To be honest, I felt 
concerned with just us Digimon.
But with a Tamer on our side,
I feel much more relieved.

original:
Hey, ^P... We have a 
small problem...
You remember that DigiShip you
found earlier?
Well, a part known as the 'Black
Box' was missing from it.
It's an important part used for 
giving the ship directions.
Without it, there's no way the ship
could ever get to South Bridge.
translation:
Hey, ^P... We have a 
small problem...
You remember that DigiShip you
found earlier?
Well, a part known as the 'Black
Box' was missing from it.
It's an important part used for 
giving the ship directions.
Without it, there's no way the ship
could ever get to South Bridge.

original:
Huh?! That's no good! Then how 
are we gonna find Yui and Takuto?!
Please, we'll help however we can, 
but you gotta figure something out!
translation:
Huh?! That's no good! Then how 
are we gonna find Yui and Takuto?!
Please, we'll help however we can, 
but you gotta figure something out!

original:
I get what you're asking, but I 
can't just program another 
Black Box from nothing...
There might be one somewhere 
around North Bridge, so why don't 
we start searching for it?
translation:
I get what you're asking, but I 
can't just program another 
Black Box from nothing...
There might be one somewhere 
around North Bridge, so why don't 
we start searching for it?

original:
Somewhere? Like where? Don't you
have any other clues?
translation:
Somewhere? Like where? Don't you
have any other clues?

original:
Hmmm... Let me think......... 

Oh, I know! Have you tried 
searching Packet Coast yet?
It's the path on your right as you 
exit the DigiBase, that Sukamon 
and the others were blocking.

Behind them, there were unmovable
Virus Blocks...
But it seems the Blocks are gone 
now, so you should be able to go.
Why don't we try searching 
around Packet Coast first?
translation:
Hmmm... Let me think......... 

Oh, I know! Have you tried 
searching Packet Coast yet?
It's the path on your right as you 
exit the DigiBase, that Sukamon 
and the others were blocking.

Behind them, there were unmovable
Virus Blocks...
But it seems the Blocks are gone 
now, so you should be able to go.
Why don't we try searching 
around Packet Coast first?

original:
OK! So just to the right after 
exiting the DigiBase, right?
We'll find the Black Box, don't 
worry.
Hiroyuki, you stay here and 
do some chores or something. 
But if you end up causing more 
trouble to everyone...
It'll be you doing the fighting 
instead of the Digimon!
translation:
OK! So just to the right after 
exiting the DigiBase, right?
We'll find the Black Box, don't 
worry.
Hiroyuki, you stay here and 
do some chores or something. 
But if you end up causing more 
trouble to everyone...
It'll be you doing the fighting 
instead of the Digimon!

original:
Yes, ma'am...

I'll stay right here and support 
Gatomon with everything I've got!
translation:
Yes, ma'am...

I'll stay right here and support 
Gatomon with everything I've got!

original:
I, uh... really don't need any help, 
but...
Just don't go touching anything 
without asking, alright...?
translation:
I, uh... really don't need any help, 
but...
Just don't go touching anything 
without asking, alright...?

original:
Alright, ^P, let's head to
Packet Coast!
First we need to focus on finding
that Black Box.
While we're at it, we can also 
gather some Bug Plates!
Does that sound good?
translation:
Alright, ^P, let's head to
Packet Coast!
First we need to focus on finding
that Black Box.
While we're at it, we can also 
gather some Bug Plates!
Does that sound good?

original:
Oh, wait a second, ^P!

Before you go, there's a Digimon
I'd like you to meet.
translation:
Oh, wait a second, ^P!

Before you go, there's a Digimon
I'd like you to meet.

original: Hey there, Gatomon!
translation: Hey there, Gatomon!

original:
An ally of justice! 
Pandamon is here!
I heard the DigiBase was in a pinch,
so I came to lend a hand!
translation:
An ally of justice! 
Pandamon is here!
I heard the DigiBase was in a pinch,
so I came to lend a hand!

original:
I've been waiting for you, 
Pandamon! Thanks for coming!
translation:
I've been waiting for you, 
Pandamon! Thanks for coming!

original:
Pandamon is a very reliable 
Digimon who runs an Item Shop.
They carry many items that are
very useful for Tamers.
We don't have any shops nearby,
so we're always calling Pandamon.
translation:
Pandamon is a very reliable 
Digimon who runs an Item Shop.
They carry many items that are
very useful for Tamers.
We don't have any shops nearby,
so we're always calling Pandamon.

original:
An item shop, huh... So you're
like a shopkeeper, Pandamon?
translation:
An item shop, huh... So you're
like a shopkeeper, Pandamon?

original:
Indeed. A shopkeeper and an ally
of justice!
I heard some terrible rumors and
hurried over here immediately.
Hey, is it true that Sukamon and
the others were erased?
translation:
Indeed. A shopkeeper and an ally
of justice!
I heard some terrible rumors and
hurried over here immediately.
Hey, is it true that Sukamon and
the others were erased?

original:
Yeah, it's true...

The DigiBase was attacked by
Erasers...
They destroyed the Evolution Tree, 
and lots of Digimon were erased.
Sukamon, Geremon, Raremon,
Mushroomon, Vegiemon...
I've yet to check further, but 
I'm sure we lost many more.
translation:
Yeah, it's true...

The DigiBase was attacked by
Erasers...
They destroyed the Evolution Tree, 
and lots of Digimon were erased.
Sukamon, Geremon, Raremon,
Mushroomon, Vegiemon...
I've yet to check further, but 
I'm sure we lost many more.

original:
Erased from the EvolutionTree... 
So they can't be returned?
translation:
Erased from the EvolutionTree... 
So they can't be returned?

original:
Probably not... If they're not
on the Evolution Tree...
Then no one can Digivolve into
that Digimon anymore.
translation:
Probably not... If they're not
on the Evolution Tree...
Then no one can Digivolve into
that Digimon anymore.

original:
There may still be some survivors 
hidden somewhere.
However, if there aren't any of a 
particular species left...
Then they may as well be 
considered extinct...
translation:
There may still be some survivors 
hidden somewhere.
However, if there aren't any of a 
particular species left...
Then they may as well be 
considered extinct...

original:
How could they... This is
absolutely unforgivable!
Just what on earth are these 
Eraser creatures?
translation:
How could they... This is
absolutely unforgivable!
Just what on earth are these 
Eraser creatures?

original:
Well... We don't know for sure,
but what we do know is...
They're subordinates of beings
known as Selectors.
translation:
Well... We don't know for sure,
but what we do know is...
They're subordinates of beings
known as Selectors.

original:
A long time ago, Tamers suddenly
disappeared from this world.
The Bandits and Erasers began 
appearing around then, too. 
They were probably responsible for
the Tamers' disappearance...
They did end up invading the
Tamer Union after all.
translation:
A long time ago, Tamers suddenly
disappeared from this world.
The Bandits and Erasers began 
appearing around then, too. 
They were probably responsible for
the Tamers' disappearance...
They did end up invading the
Tamer Union after all.

original:
Hmph! Doesn't matter who or what
those guys are!
We still have allies on our side that
haven't been erased!
If we can fix the Evolution Tree, 
those Selectors will be no problem!
Plus, we have reliable Tamers here
to fight by our side!
translation:
Hmph! Doesn't matter who or what
those guys are!
We still have allies on our side that
haven't been erased!
If we can fix the Evolution Tree, 
those Selectors will be no problem!
Plus, we have reliable Tamers here
to fight by our side!

original:
That's right, we'll lend them our
strength. Right, ^P?
We won't allow those guys to just
do whatever they want anymore!
translation:
That's right, we'll lend them our
strength. Right, ^P?
We won't allow those guys to just
do whatever they want anymore!

original:
Alright, we're off, everyone!
We'll definitely find the Black Box! 
And we'll bring back some 
Bug Plates, too!
translation:
Alright, we're off, everyone!
We'll definitely find the Black Box! 
And we'll bring back some 
Bug Plates, too!

original:
W-wait a moment, you guys!

Before you go, I'd like you to try 
out the Repair Console.
translation:
W-wait a moment, you guys!

Before you go, I'd like you to try 
out the Repair Console.

original:
Digimon drop Bug Plates. 
These DigiPlates are in a bad 
condition and are full of bugs.

You need to clean up the Plates in
the DigiLab.
And that's where the Repair 
Console comes in handy!
translation:
Digimon drop Bug Plates. 
These DigiPlates are in a bad 
condition and are full of bugs.

You need to clean up the Plates in
the DigiLab.
And that's where the Repair 
Console comes in handy!

original:
If you fail to fix a Bug Plate in the
Repair Console, it'll break.
But if you do well, it'll turn into
a DigiPlate.
Once you put the DigiPlate into
the Evolution Tree...
That Digimon's Digivolution will
become available once more.
translation:
If you fail to fix a Bug Plate in the
Repair Console, it'll break.
But if you do well, it'll turn into
a DigiPlate.
Once you put the DigiPlate into
the Evolution Tree...
That Digimon's Digivolution will
become available once more.

original:
I see... What should we do if it
breaks then..?
translation:
I see... What should we do if it
breaks then..?

original:
I'll give you a Bug Plate I have on
me right now to practice on,
so why don't you give it a try?
translation:
I'll give you a Bug Plate I have on
me right now to practice on,
so why don't you give it a try?

original:
Bug Plate obtained!
？？？？？？？？
translation:
Bug Plate obtained!
？？？？？？？？

original:
Now I'll give you the Tools you
need for the Repair Console!
translation:
Now I'll give you the Tools you
need for the Repair Console!

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i
translation:
Obtained a Key Item!
^i

original:
Just enter the DigiLab and select
the 'Repair Console'.
Then the Repair Console will open.

When you have a repaired DigiPlate,
select the 'DigiPlate' option.
Then set that DigiPlate into its 
slot on the Evolution Tree!
Good luck!
translation:
Just enter the DigiLab and select
the 'Repair Console'.
Then the Repair Console will open.

When you have a repaired DigiPlate,
select the 'DigiPlate' option.
Then set that DigiPlate into its 
slot on the Evolution Tree!
Good luck!

original:
If you want to know more on the
Repair Console before you start,
Go and talk to Renamon, alright?
After you've used the Console,
Renamon will tell you about how to
set repaired DigiPlates into the 
Evolution Tree.
translation:
If you want to know more on the
Repair Console before you start,
Go and talk to Renamon, alright?
After you've used the Console,
Renamon will tell you about how to
set repaired DigiPlates into the 
Evolution Tree.

original:
Hey ^P, give the Repair
Console a try, alright?
Just enter the DigiLab and select
the 'Repair Console' option.
Then the Repair Console will open.

When you have a repaired DigiPlate,
select the 'DigiPlate' option.
Then set that DigiPlate into its 
slot on the Evolution Tree!
If you get confused about anything,
just ask Renamon for help!
translation:
Hey ^P, give the Repair
Console a try, alright?
Just enter the DigiLab and select
the 'Repair Console' option.
Then the Repair Console will open.

When you have a repaired DigiPlate,
select the 'DigiPlate' option.
Then set that DigiPlate into its 
slot on the Evolution Tree!
If you get confused about anything,
just ask Renamon for help!

original:
Oh no, did you mess up, 
^P?
That's alright, I'll give you another
one so you can try again.
Just enter the DigiLab and select
the 'Repair Console',
Then you can try repairing it again!

When you have a repaired DigiPlate,
select the 'DigiPlate' option.
Then set that DigiPlate into its 
slot on the Evolution Tree!
If you get confused about anything,
just ask Renamon for help!
translation:
Oh no, did you mess up, 
^P?
That's alright, I'll give you another
one so you can try again.
Just enter the DigiLab and select
the 'Repair Console',
Then you can try repairing it again!

When you have a repaired DigiPlate,
select the 'DigiPlate' option.
Then set that DigiPlate into its 
slot on the Evolution Tree!
If you get confused about anything,
just ask Renamon for help!

original:
Bug Plate obtained!
？？？？？？？？
translation:
Bug Plate obtained!
？？？？？？？？

original:
Hey ^P, since you've
finished repairing a Plate,
Why don't you set it into the
Evolution Tree?
When you have a repaired DigiPlate,
select the 'DigiPlate' option.
Then set that DigiPlate into its 
slot on the Evolution Tree!
If you get confused about anything,
just ask Renamon for help!
translation:
Hey ^P, since you've
finished repairing a Plate,
Why don't you set it into the
Evolution Tree?
When you have a repaired DigiPlate,
select the 'DigiPlate' option.
Then set that DigiPlate into its 
slot on the Evolution Tree!
If you get confused about anything,
just ask Renamon for help!

original:
Congratulations! You did so well,
^P!
It was pretty simple, wasn't it?
translation:
Congratulations! You did so well,
^P!
It was pretty simple, wasn't it?

original:
Wh-wh-what do you guys want?!
What even are you?!
Haven't you heard of me? I'm the
great Vegiemon, you thugs!
translation:
Wh-wh-what do you guys want?!
What even are you?!
Haven't you heard of me? I'm the
great Vegiemon, you thugs!

original:
Checking erase list.
Confirming Lost Digimon type.
Erase Vegiemon.
translation:
Checking erase list.
Confirming Lost Digimon type.
Erase Vegiemon.

original: Erase!
translation: Erase!

original: H-huh!? Wh-what...?!
translation: H-huh!? Wh-what...?!

original:
Checking erase list.
Checking erase list.
translation:
Checking erase list.
Checking erase list.

original:
No sign of Lost Digimon.
No sign of Lost Digimon.
translation:
No sign of Lost Digimon.
No sign of Lost Digimon.

original:
Confirming movement orders:
Destination, DigiBase.
Confirming movement orders:
Destination, DigiBase.
translation:
Confirming movement orders:
Destination, DigiBase.
Confirming movement orders:
Destination, DigiBase.

original:
Emergency!
Digivice detected!
Emergency!
Digivice detected!
translation:
Emergency!
Digivice detected!
Emergency!
Digivice detected!

original:
How dare you continue to erase
more Digimon!
We won't let you guys anywhere 
near the DigiBase.
Not a chance!
translation:
How dare you continue to erase
more Digimon!
We won't let you guys anywhere 
near the DigiBase.
Not a chance!

original:
Checking erase list.
Possible P-Rank Tamer.
No action authorized.
Standby for orders.
translation:
Checking erase list.
Possible P-Rank Tamer.
No action authorized.
Standby for orders.

original:
Evidence they have been sent
here by the Numbers detected.
Evidence they have been sent
here by the Numbers detected.
translation:
Evidence they have been sent
here by the Numbers detected.
Evidence they have been sent
here by the Numbers detected.

original:
Investigation on relationship to
the Numbers is required.
Investigation on relationship to
the Numbers is required.
translation:
Investigation on relationship to
the Numbers is required.
Investigation on relationship to
the Numbers is required.

original:
Hey... wait... You've got it all 
wrong!
Numbers...? Do you mean those
Bandits?
We weren't with them, we were 
brought here against our will!
translation:
Hey... wait... You've got it all 
wrong!
Numbers...? Do you mean those
Bandits?
We weren't with them, we were 
brought here against our will!

original:
Confirming order to erase
Numbers.
Confirming order to erase
Numbers.
translation:
Confirming order to erase
Numbers.
Confirming order to erase
Numbers.

original: Wait, what...?
translation: Wait, what...?

original:
Capture possible P-Rank Tamer.
Erase all others.
Capture possible P-Rank Tamer.
Erase all others.
translation:
Capture possible P-Rank Tamer.
Erase all others.
Capture possible P-Rank Tamer.
Erase all others.

original:
H-hey, are you implying the rest of
us have no potential!? How rude!
translation:
H-hey, are you implying the rest of
us have no potential!? How rude!

original:
^P, We're counting on you.
Take these guys out!
translation:
^P, We're counting on you.
Take these guys out!

original: Erase!
translation: Erase!

original: Erase!
translation: Erase!

original: Erase!
translation: Erase!

original:
Capture unsuccessful.
Erasers, withdraw.
Capture unsuccessful.
Erasers, withdraw.
translation:
Capture unsuccessful.
Erasers, withdraw.
Capture unsuccessful.
Erasers, withdraw.

original:
Oh, are you finally giving up? 
Not as dumb as you look, eh?
translation:
Oh, are you finally giving up? 
Not as dumb as you look, eh?

original:
P-Rank potential is 64%.
Report back to Selectors.
P-Rank potential is 64%.
Report back to Selectors.
translation:
P-Rank potential is 64%.
Report back to Selectors.
P-Rank potential is 64%.
Report back to Selectors.

original:
...Those guys sure are stubborn!

Okay, now we need to hurry up and
find that Black Box!
translation:
...Those guys sure are stubborn!

Okay, now we need to hurry up and
find that Black Box!

original:
Uhhmmm...?

Gatomon said that the Black Box 
should be around Packet Coast...
I wonder if this is the right area...?
translation:
Uhhmmm...?

Gatomon said that the Black Box 
should be around Packet Coast...
I wonder if this is the right area...?

original:
Oh... shoot.

While we know that it's called a
Black Box...
We never asked what it actually
looks like...
translation:
Oh... shoot.

While we know that it's called a
Black Box...
We never asked what it actually
looks like...

original:
Bla-bla Black Box
So black, and so square♪
translation:
Bla-bla Black Box
So black, and so square♪

original:
Bla-bla Black Box
Is what I have right here♪
translation:
Bla-bla Black Box
Is what I have right here♪

original:
...That's gotta be it.

Looks like they're in a good mood, 
too. What great timing!
Let's hurry and ask if they'll give it
to us!
translation:
...That's gotta be it.

Looks like they're in a good mood, 
too. What great timing!
Let's hurry and ask if they'll give it
to us!

original:
...Who are you!? You guys sure
look suspicious...!
Wait, you look like you want to 
steal my Black Box!
translation:
...Who are you!? You guys sure
look suspicious...!
Wait, you look like you want to 
steal my Black Box!

original:
Not exactly... we don't want to 
steal it from you, ok?
We were actually wondering... if 
maybe you could just give it to us?
Please?
translation:
Not exactly... we don't want to 
steal it from you, ok?
We were actually wondering... if 
maybe you could just give it to us?
Please?

original:
Shut up! I won't be tricked by you!
Just leave me alone, you thieves!
Leave, right now! Go on, scram!
translation:
Shut up! I won't be tricked by you!
Just leave me alone, you thieves!
Leave, right now! Go on, scram!

original:
Hey, wait a sec... could you guys
be... Tamers!?
translation:
Hey, wait a sec... could you guys
be... Tamers!?

original:
Huh? Ummm......
Yeah! W-we are!
We're working hard to help save
the Digital World!
translation:
Huh? Ummm......
Yeah! W-we are!
We're working hard to help save
the Digital World!

original:
Is that so..? I was going to chase 
you away with my deadly attacks.
However, the fact that you're 
Tamers changes things...
translation:
Is that so..? I was going to chase 
you away with my deadly attacks.
However, the fact that you're 
Tamers changes things...

original:
It looks like he's willing to listen to
reason now.
Wow, it seems like all Digimon are 
kind to Tamers...
translation:
It looks like he's willing to listen to
reason now.
Wow, it seems like all Digimon are 
kind to Tamers...

original:
Dirty rotten traitors! That's all
you Tamers are!
I'll burn you guys to a crisp until 
there's nothing left!
translation:
Dirty rotten traitors! That's all
you Tamers are!
I'll burn you guys to a crisp until 
there's nothing left!

original: Wait... What?! Why?!
translation: Wait... What?! Why?!

original:
Come on, come at me! If you don't,
then I'll attack first!
I'll fry you up until your hair
turns all frizzy!
translation:
Come on, come at me! If you don't,
then I'll attack first!
I'll fry you up until your hair
turns all frizzy!

original:
Nooooooo thank youuuuuu......

Rather than a frizzy look,
won't it turn out more like an afro?
translation:
Nooooooo thank youuuuuu......

Rather than a frizzy look,
won't it turn out more like an afro?

original:
I'm sorry, ^P... I guess 
I couldn't talk him out of it.
This part is up to you!
translation:
I'm sorry, ^P... I guess 
I couldn't talk him out of it.
This part is up to you!

original:
Uhmm... We're sorry, but... could
you please hand it over?
It's an important part for directing 
a DigiShip.
You don't have a DigiShip, do you?
So you don't really need it...
translation:
Uhmm... We're sorry, but... could
you please hand it over?
It's an important part for directing 
a DigiShip.
You don't have a DigiShip, do you?
So you don't really need it...

original:
Shut up!

I'm the one who found this! 
Finders keepers!
I can go anywhere I want if I just 
use this!
translation:
Shut up!

I'm the one who found this! 
Finders keepers!
I can go anywhere I want if I just 
use this!

original:
Now, now... What if we let you 
borrow it later instead?
Where do you want to go, anyway?
translation:
Now, now... What if we let you 
borrow it later instead?
Where do you want to go, anyway?

original: ......To the Digital World.
translation: ......To the Digital World.

original: ...What?
translation: ...What?

original:
The world before it became this 
mess of a place...
The lively, fun world bustling with
people and Digimon.
That's the Digital World I want to 
go to! Got a problem with that?!
translation:
The world before it became this 
mess of a place...
The lively, fun world bustling with
people and Digimon.
That's the Digital World I want to 
go to! Got a problem with that?!

original:
...No, not at all...

But even if you had a DigiShip, you
still couldn't go there, you know?
You see, the Black Box isn't what
you need for that...
What you really need is the support
of everyone right here. Right?
translation:
...No, not at all...

But even if you had a DigiShip, you
still couldn't go there, you know?
You see, the Black Box isn't what
you need for that...
What you really need is the support
of everyone right here. Right?

original:
Enough! Quit spitting lies like that!

I don't believe anything you Tamers
say anymore!
You're all untrustworthy and 
unreliable, not worth my help!
Our Tamers just made us fight and
gave us hollow words of support...
But when the Selectors showed up,
they all abandoned us and ran!
There's no way I could trust a 
Tamer anymore!
translation:
Enough! Quit spitting lies like that!

I don't believe anything you Tamers
say anymore!
You're all untrustworthy and 
unreliable, not worth my help!
Our Tamers just made us fight and
gave us hollow words of support...
But when the Selectors showed up,
they all abandoned us and ran!
There's no way I could trust a 
Tamer anymore!

original: ...I see. So that's how it is.
translation: ...I see. So that's how it is.

original:
So in the end you're just sulking
because you believe...
...you were abandoned by your
Tamer.
translation:
So in the end you're just sulking
because you believe...
...you were abandoned by your
Tamer.

original: Wh... what did you just say!?
translation: Wh... what did you just say!?

original:
It looks like there's been a huge 
misunderstanding. 
We could fix this if you'd just 
listen to what we have to say. 
If you like, we can go search for 
your Tamer for you, alright?
translation:
It looks like there's been a huge 
misunderstanding. 
We could fix this if you'd just 
listen to what we have to say. 
If you like, we can go search for 
your Tamer for you, alright?

original:
Who would ask something like that!
I don't need a Tamer!
... Humans and the like... I hate
them, all of them!
translation:
Who would ask something like that!
I don't need a Tamer!
... Humans and the like... I hate
them, all of them!

original:
Oh... Shoot.

He took the Black Box with him...
translation:
Oh... Shoot.

He took the Black Box with him...

original: Hey, how are you guys doing?
translation: Hey, how are you guys doing?

original:
Sorry, Terriermon.

The Digimon who had the Black Box
ran away.
translation:
Sorry, Terriermon.

The Digimon who had the Black Box
ran away.

original:
I see... 
That's unfortunate.
Well, for now, could you try opening
the DigiPort just up ahead?
I'd like to test out the DigiShip by 
sending it there.
If it works, you'll be able to use it 
to return here right away.
translation:
I see... 
That's unfortunate.
Well, for now, could you try opening
the DigiPort just up ahead?
I'd like to test out the DigiShip by 
sending it there.
If it works, you'll be able to use it 
to return here right away.

original:
Really?

It would be nice to not have to walk
so far all the time.
translation:
Really?

It would be nice to not have to walk
so far all the time.

original:
Yeah, it's quite useful, so give it a 
try!
I'll see you soon.
translation:
Yeah, it's quite useful, so give it a 
try!
I'll see you soon.

original:
Alright, let's make our way to the
DigiPort.
translation:
Alright, let's make our way to the
DigiPort.

original: There's something over there.
translation: There's something over there.

original: Looks like a switch... and a door...
translation: Looks like a switch... and a door...

original:
Have you reached the gate to the
DigiPort?
If you don't have the specific key 
for the gate, it won't open.
translation:
Have you reached the gate to the
DigiPort?
If you don't have the specific key 
for the gate, it won't open.

original:
Oh, but it seems you already have
the key.
If that's the case, just touch the 
switch and it'll open.
translation:
Oh, but it seems you already have
the key.
If that's the case, just touch the 
switch and it'll open.

original:
The key to the DigiPort should be
nearby somewhere.
Why don't you try opening some
chests?
translation:
The key to the DigiPort should be
nearby somewhere.
Why don't you try opening some
chests?

original:
Just beyond the gate is the 
DigiPort.
And a little further in should be the
DigiShip's landing point.
The DigiShip will bring you back 
here without any input on your end.
Good luck!
translation:
Just beyond the gate is the 
DigiPort.
And a little further in should be the
DigiShip's landing point.
The DigiShip will bring you back 
here without any input on your end.
Good luck!

original:
So the DigiShip is coming... 
Let's go take a look!
translation:
So the DigiShip is coming... 
Let's go take a look!

original: Hmmm... So this is the DigiPort.
translation: Hmmm... So this is the DigiPort.

original:
I see... This is where the DigiShip
will land...
translation:
I see... This is where the DigiShip
will land...

original:
Obtained a DigiPlate!
Devimon
translation:
Obtained a DigiPlate!
Devimon

original:
That's a DigiPlate, right?
What Digimon is it...
...Devimon??
translation:
That's a DigiPlate, right?
What Digimon is it...
...Devimon??

original: Did you make it to the DigiPort?
translation: Did you make it to the DigiPort?

original:
Yeah, we're currently waiting inside
it.
We also picked up a DigiPlate.

I wonder what a plate was doing in
a place like this, though?
translation:
Yeah, we're currently waiting inside
it.
We also picked up a DigiPlate.

I wonder what a plate was doing in
a place like this, though?

original:
Someone must have dropped it... 
But that's odd... this DigiPort...
No one's used it since the Tamers 
all disappeared...
translation:
Someone must have dropped it... 
But that's odd... this DigiPort...
No one's used it since the Tamers 
all disappeared...

original:
Hey, Terriermon...

Is there any connection between
Devimon and DemiDevimon...?
translation:
Hey, Terriermon...

Is there any connection between
Devimon and DemiDevimon...?

original:
Yes, Devimon is DemiDevimon's
Champion form.
translation:
Yes, Devimon is DemiDevimon's
Champion form.

original:
But to think you'd find Devimon's 
DigiPlate in there, of all places...
Hey, ^P, could you bring 
that plate back here?
Calumon's been searching for it for
a very long time.
translation:
But to think you'd find Devimon's 
DigiPlate in there, of all places...
Hey, ^P, could you bring 
that plate back here?
Calumon's been searching for it for
a very long time.

original:
A very long time? 
How long, exactly?
translation:
A very long time? 
How long, exactly?

original:
Hmm... Quite a while. Since before 
the Tamers all disappeared.
But... it's so strange.

Just when we finally found the one
plate that was originally missing,
now the rest of the Evolution tree 
is missing.
translation:
Hmm... Quite a while. Since before 
the Tamers all disappeared.
But... it's so strange.

Just when we finally found the one
plate that was originally missing,
now the rest of the Evolution tree 
is missing.

original: I see, so that's how it is...
translation: I see, so that's how it is...

original:
^P, right now you're at the
center of North Bridge,
which is located to the north of
Motherboard Continent.
Where you are is called Login Port,
within Login Mountain.
Could you please return to the
DigiBase for a moment?
translation:
^P, right now you're at the
center of North Bridge,
which is located to the north of
Motherboard Continent.
Where you are is called Login Port,
within Login Mountain.
Could you please return to the
DigiBase for a moment?

original:
Alright, let's go back! We need to 
put this Plate back into the tree.
Then we can return here and find 
that little Demi guy!
translation:
Alright, let's go back! We need to 
put this Plate back into the tree.
Then we can return here and find 
that little Demi guy!

original: H-hey, wait, DemiDevimon!
translation: H-hey, wait, DemiDevimon!

original:
Hmph! Just try and catch me, you
slowpokes!
translation:
Hmph! Just try and catch me, you
slowpokes!

original:
Grrr... you're really starting to get
on my nerves, you know...
I won't let you get away so easily!
translation:
Grrr... you're really starting to get
on my nerves, you know...
I won't let you get away so easily!

original:
Shut it! Like I care! Now, get lost!
Go away! Scram!
Just beat it, you liars!
Pathetic cowards! Short-stacks!
Brats!
translation:
Shut it! Like I care! Now, get lost!
Go away! Scram!
Just beat it, you liars!
Pathetic cowards! Short-stacks!
Brats!

original:
Grrrr...!

Those are such pathetically bad
insults, and yet...
When it's him saying it, it really 
does tick me off!
translation:
Grrrr...!

Those are such pathetically bad
insults, and yet...
When it's him saying it, it really 
does tick me off!

original:
How'd it go? Are you alright,
Asuka?
translation:
How'd it go? Are you alright,
Asuka?

original:
I'm not alright, not at all!

His hatred for Tamers is insane,
and he just keeps picking fights,
despite the fact that his issues
have nothing to do with us!
He's just taking all his anger out 
on us!
translation:
I'm not alright, not at all!

His hatred for Tamers is insane,
and he just keeps picking fights,
despite the fact that his issues
have nothing to do with us!
He's just taking all his anger out 
on us!

original:
Hmmm... Hey, Asuka...?

Maybe he's just desperate to be
able to Digivolve again...?
translation:
Hmmm... Hey, Asuka...?

Maybe he's just desperate to be
able to Digivolve again...?

original:
Give me a break!

If that's the kind of attitude he's
going to take with someone trying
to help, then I'll just have to beat
some common sense into him!
translation:
Give me a break!

If that's the kind of attitude he's
going to take with someone trying
to help, then I'll just have to beat
some common sense into him!
